ygData.subject: Re: Kobold Vs Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: On the Subject of languages.   Kobold and elder Tier D al are the same. It s the same for Dark Elven and Tier D al.  They show up as two different names
ygData.messageBody:
On the Subject of languages. Kobold and elder Tier D'al are the same.
It's the same for Dark Elven and Tier D'al. They show up as two different
names depending on whether you are looking at the chat window or the skills
listing. It also seems I am able to learn the basics of a new language each
level I advance. I have recently gotten Lizardman and Goblin from my
trainer. My languages so far are :

Common, Elder Elvish, Elvish, Dwarven, Dark Elven/Tier D'al, Erudin, Old
Erudin, Gnoll, Barbarian, Gnomish, Halfling, Dark Speech, Kobold/Elder Tier
D'al, Ogre, Troll, Goblin, and Lizard Man.

I'm still looking for a high level monk to teach me the basics of Dragon.

On the subject of words. I seem to find more words than anything else.
This is good for me since I am a Necromancer. I have found most of them on
DW crocs and DW Caimans in Oasis. I have also found words and Runes on
Lavacrawlers in Lavastorm. There is no certain place where they are found,
I think all upper level monsters drop them from time to time. I have a
Druid friend who has found words, runes, and grimoire pages on Griffawns and
Griffennes in the Karanas. I think I covered everything I wanted to. If
there are any high level monks that know the basics of Dragon on
Bristlebain, or anyone else who knows it, give me a tell in-game if you do
not mind spamming me for a couple minutes to teach me the basice. I will
gladly trade knowledge of my languages with you.


Dalthas
Dark Elf Necromancer
Currently lvl 17
Bristlebain
